meanings.definition: The art or process of printing from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: I learned about xylography in art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful xylography of a forest scene.
meanings.sent3: The xylography of a tree looked like it was waving hello.
meanings.sent4: Her xylography of emotions was evident in her expressive artwork.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the xylography brought the print to life.

meanings.definition: A print made using this technique.
meanings.sent1: I bought a xylography of a famous painting at the art fair.
meanings.sent2: The xylography was framed and hung on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The xylography of the cat made me smile every time I looked at it.
meanings.sent4: His xylography of memories captured moments frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The xylography captured the essence of nature in a single image.
